sentences.en: Karen tried to swim after him but the strong undercurrent swept them apart.
sentences.cn: 卡伦试图跟在他后面游，但强大的暗流把他们冲开了。

sentences.en: I detect an undercurrent of resentment towards the new proposals.
sentences.cn: 我察觉到对新提案有一股潜在的不满情绪。

sentences.en: This is the undercurrent of conversation at Einstein memorial meetings throughout the year.
sentences.cn: 这是一整年在爱因斯坦纪念会上的潜在话题。
